sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhiyin 支飲 , propping rheum. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 21: 水癖，由飲水漿 不消，水氣結聚而成癖，在於兩脅之側，轉動便痛，不耐風寒，不欲食 而短氣是也 , “ Water aggregation-illness : When one has drunk water or thick liquid that fail to dissolve, the water qi forms nodular collections and generates aggregation-illness in the two upper flanks. Physical movement generates pain, and one cannot stand wind or cold. Patients have no appetite and are short of qi”.
